name: Crossed Fingers: Light Skin Tone
baseMeaning: Index and middle fingers crossed, traditionally for luck.
tldr: Fingers crossed! Used for hoping, wishing for luck, or hiding a lie.

contextMeanings.meaning: Hoping for luck or good outcome.
Wishing for the best or nervous anticipation.
Skeptical hope or fingers crossed behind back (lying).
Hoping for a good outcome on projects.

platformNotes.note: Common for expressing hope and anticipation.
Used for deployments and hoping things work.
Popular for wishing luck to friends and family.

generationalNotes.note: Used for hope and subtle lies.
